attributes.action: Stop the cuts to disability benefits and other benefits.
attributes.additional_details: Any decent human being on the government and parliament should vote against the disability and other benefits cuts remember they are the most vulnerable people in society do not target them. Create a wealth tax instead let the wealthiest shoulder the burden not the poorest.
attributes.background: Stop the shocking targeting of the most vulnerable in our society. Stop the disability benefits cuts and other benefit cuts This will drive the most vulnerable people in our Society into extreme poverty and will cost lives.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
